SELECT MIDS.COMPANY_CD , MIDS.DIVISION_CD , MIDS.ITEM_ID , MIN(MI.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MIN(MI.ITEM_SPEC) AS ITEM_SPEC , MIN(MI.ITEM_TYPE) AS ITEM_TYPE , MIN((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MIDS.COMPANY_CD, MIDS.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL)) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MIDS.UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MIDS.COMPANY_CD, MIDS.DIVISION_CD, MIDS.UOM) FROM DUAL) AS UOM_NM , TO_CHAR(MIDS.IO_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLOSED_DATE , SUM(MIDS.BEGIN_QTY) AS BEGIN_QTY , SUM(MIDS.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY , SUM(MIDS.OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY , SUM(MIDS.END_QTY) AS END_QTY , MIDS.ITEM_ID||'-'||NVL(MIDS.UOM, '***') AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ITEM_INOUT_DAILY_SUMMARY MIDS , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_WAREHOUSE MWH WHERE MIDS.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIDS.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MIDS.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MIDS.COMPANY_CD = MWH.COMPANY_CD AND MIDS.DIVISION_CD = MWH.DIVISION_CD AND MIDS.WAREHOUSE_CD = MWH.WAREHOUSE_CD AND MIDS.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIDS.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIDS.IO_DATE = #{closedDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (UPPER(MI.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MI.ITEM_TYPE IN (${itemType})
GROUP BY MIDS.COMPANY_CD , MIDS.DIVISION_CD , MIDS.ITEM_ID , MIDS.UOM , MIDS.IO_DATE
